title: AGC
body:
AGC is a gaming community with a core focus on camaraderie and team-based gaming. Supporting many games across many time zones. We strive for constant improvement with feedback from members and consistent communication with staff. This is to provide the best possible community for our members.
We care a lot about the standards each member sets for the community and we want to ensure a fun and enjoyable environment. AGC welcomes any and all gamers looking for fun, care-free gaming or a team-based competitive environment. 
If you would like to come say hi and play a few games with us then please join us at: https://discord.gg/UYWjmWx
See you soon!

replies.body: We do In-houses regularly, salt free guaranteed.
This sounds like fun... is there a certain ranked level you guys look for?

> [{quoted}](name=K1ppers,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=hlaIcHl9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-09T13:59:48.136+0000)
>
> This sounds like fun... is there a certain ranked level you guys look for?

No rank requirement. We have people ranging from bronze to challenger. Some people are here just to have casual fun.
I joined the server, might take a look tomorrow afternoon when I'm done with work :)

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=hlaIcHl9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-09T13:06:23.026+0000)
>
> I joined the server, might take a look tomorrow afternoon when I'm done with work :)

Sweet! The best way to get involved is to join a voice channel with others :)
We have active staff and regular events! We just got to the final round of our 1v1 tournament and we are are excited to welcome new members, so feel free to join the discord and say hi!
The inhouses are really fun and you can always find people to play with.
